pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automated Linear Regression Diagnostic // Provides a set of streamlined functions that allow easy generation of linear regression diagnostic plots necessarily for checking linear model assumptions. This package is meant for easy scheming of linear regression diagnostics, while preserving merits of "The Grammar of Graphics" as implemented in 'ggplot2'. See the 'ggplot2' website for more information regarding the specific capability of graphics.
